snippet: Inspired by the selection of a 1934 Voisin as Best of Show at the Pebble Beach concours last year, an exhibition is being assembled in California to honor Gabriel Voisin, a French automaker and aviation pioneer.
abstract: Mullin Automotive Museum in Oxnard, Calif, is assembling a show dedicated to Gabriel Voisin, a French automaker and aviation pioneer; the exhibition, which is set for November, was inspired by the selection of a 1934 Voisin as Best of Show at the Pebble Beach Concours d'Elegance.
lead_paragraph: Inspired by the selection of a 1934 Voisin as Best of Show at the Pebble Beach concours last year, an exhibition is being assembled in California to honor Gabriel Voisin, a French automaker and aviation pioneer.

headline.seo: Voisin, Auto Innovator, Gets a Show of His Own
headline.main: Voisin, Auto Innovator, Gets a Show of His Own
headline.print_headline: Voisin, Auto Innovator, Gets a Show of His Own
